CustomField.description: The API name of the field that data will be read from. When using CALCULATE action use this field to define calculation. Example: csmso__Total_Price__c - One_Off_Price__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The API name of the field that data will be read from. When using CALCULATE action use this field to define calculation. Example: csmso__Total_Price__c - One_Off_Price__c
CustomField.label: Source Field API Name
